item.title: TikTok Ban Signed in Montana, Paving Way for First Amendment Legal Battle
item.description: Montana Bans TikTok, Setting Off First Amendment Legal Battle Montana became the first state in the U.S. to ban TikTok when Governor Greg Gianforte signed a bill into law on Wednesday afternoon. The law prohibits anyone in the state from downloading or using the app, and also applies to app stores that offer TikTok for download.
